data.name: ArgumentException_ConfigPathNullOrEmpty
data.value: Configuration loading failed: File path cannot be null or empty. Please provide a valid path to the configuration file (e.g., 'sguard.json' or 'sguard.yaml').

data.name: ArgumentException_AppSettingsPathNullOrEmpty
data.value: AppSettings loading failed: File path cannot be null or empty. Please provide a valid path to the app settings file (e.g., 'appsettings.json' or 'appsettings.yaml').

data.name: ArgumentException_FilePathNullOrEmpty
data.value: File operation failed: File path is required but was null or empty. Please provide a valid file path for the write operation.

data.name: ArgumentException_BasePathNullOrEmpty
data.value: Base path cannot be null or empty.

data.name: ArgumentException_ConfigJsonNullOrEmpty
data.value: Configuration JSON cannot be null or empty.

data.name: ArgumentException_ConditionValueNull
data.value: Condition value cannot be null for comparison

data.name: ArgumentException_ValuesNotComparable
data.value: Values are not comparable

data.name: ArgumentException_UnknownOutputFormat
data.value: Unknown output format: '{0}'. Supported formats: json, text, console

data.name: ConfigurationException_FileNotFound
data.value: Configuration loading failed: File not found at path '{0}'. Resolved absolute path: '{1}'. Please ensure the file exists and the path is correct. Check for typos, verify the file location, and ensure you have read permissions.

data.name: ConfigurationException_FileSizeExceedsLimit
data.value: Configuration loading failed: File size exceeds security limit. File: '{0}' (absolute path: '{1}'). Actual size: {2:F2} MB ({3:N0} bytes). Maximum allowed: {4:F2} MB ({5:N0} bytes). Exceeded by: {6:F2} MB. This may indicate a DoS attack attempt or corrupted file. Please verify the file integrity and reduce its size if legitimate.

data.name: ConfigurationException_FileEmpty
data.value: Configuration loading failed: File is empty. File: '{0}' (absolute path: '{1}'). The file exists but contains no content. Please ensure the file contains valid JSON or YAML configuration data.

data.name: ConfigurationException_SchemaValidationFailed
data.value: Configuration validation failed: File does not match the expected schema. Configuration file: '{0}' (absolute path: '{1}'). Schema file: '{2}' (absolute path: '{3}'). Validation errors:{4}{5} Please review the schema requirements and fix the configuration file accordingly.

data.name: ConfigurationException_DeserializationReturnedNull
data.value: Configuration loading failed: Deserialization returned null. File: '{0}' (absolute path: '{1}'). File size: {2:N0} bytes. The file may be malformed, contain invalid JSON structure, or be empty after whitespace removal. Please verify the JSON syntax is valid and matches the expected SGuard configuration format.

data.name: ConfigurationException_NoEnvironments
data.value: Configuration validation failed: No environments defined. File: '{0}' (absolute path: '{1}'). Found {2} rule(s) but 0 environments. At least one environment definition is required. Please add an 'environments' array with at least one environment object containing 'id', 'name', and 'path' properties.

data.name: ConfigurationException_NoRules
data.value: Configuration validation failed: No rules defined. File: '{0}' (absolute path: '{1}'). Found {2} environment(s) but 0 rules. At least one rule definition is required. Please add a 'rules' array with at least one rule object.

data.name: ConfigurationException_EnvironmentCountExceedsLimit
data.value: Configuration validation failed: Environment count exceeds security limit. File: '{0}' (absolute path: '{1}'). Actual count: {2} environments. Maximum allowed: {3} environments. Exceeded by: {4} environments. This may indicate a DoS attack attempt. Please reduce the number of environments or contact your administrator to adjust the security limits.

data.name: ConfigurationException_RuleCountExceedsLimit
data.value: Configuration validation failed: Rule count exceeds security limit. File: '{0}' (absolute path: '{1}'). Actual count: {2} rules. Maximum allowed: {3} rules. Exceeded by: {4} rules. This may indicate a DoS attack attempt. Please reduce the number of rules or contact your administrator to adjust the security limits.

data.name: ConfigurationException_StructureValidationFailed
data.value: Configuration validation failed: Structure validation found {0} error(s). File: '{1}' (absolute path: '{2}'). Validation errors:{3}{4} Please review each error above and fix the configuration file accordingly.

data.name: ConfigurationException_InvalidJsonFormat
data.value: Configuration loading failed: Invalid JSON format detected. File: '{0}' (absolute path: '{1}'). JSON parsing error: {2}. Error location: {3}. Please verify the JSON syntax is valid (check for missing commas, brackets, quotes, etc.) and try again.

data.name: ConfigurationException_IOException
data.value: Configuration loading failed: I/O error occurred while reading the file. File: '{0}' (absolute path: '{1}'). Error: {2}. Possible causes: file is locked by another process, disk is full, network path is unavailable, or insufficient permissions. Please check file access permissions and ensure the file is not in use by another application.

data.name: ConfigurationException_UnexpectedError
data.value: Configuration loading failed: Unexpected error occurred. File: '{0}' (absolute path: '{1}'). Exception type: {2}. Error message: {3}. This is an unexpected error. Please check the logs for more details and contact support if the issue persists.

data.value: YAML configuration loading failed: Error converting YAML to JSON. File: '{0}' (absolute path: '{1}'). JSON conversion error: {2}. Error location: {3}. Please review the YAML structure and ensure compatibility with JSON conversion.

data.name: UnauthorizedAccessException_InsufficientWritePermissions
data.value: File operation failed: Insufficient write permissions. File path: '{0}' (absolute: '{1}'). The current user does not have write permissions for this file. Please check file permissions and ensure the file is writable by the current user or process.

data.name: UnauthorizedAccessException_DirectoryNotFound
data.value: File operation failed: Directory not found. File path: '{0}' (absolute: '{1}'). Error: {2}. The directory containing the file does not exist and could not be created. Please ensure the directory path is valid and you have permissions to create directories.

data.name: UnauthorizedAccessException_PathSecurityNullEmpty
data.value: Path security validation failed: Resolved path or base path is null or empty. Resolved path: {0}. Base path: {1}. Both paths must be non-null and non-empty for security validation.

data.name: UnauthorizedAccessException_PathTraversalDetected
data.value: Path security validation failed: Path traversal attack detected. Resolved path: '{0}' (absolute: '{1}'). Base directory: '{2}' (absolute: '{3}'). The resolved path is outside the allowed base directory. This is a security violation and the operation has been blocked. Please ensure all file paths are relative to the base directory and do not contain path traversal sequences (..).

data.name: UnauthorizedAccessException_PathValidationUnexpectedError
data.value: Path security validation failed: Unexpected error occurred during path validation. Resolved path: '{0}' (absolute: '{1}'). Base path: '{2}' (absolute: '{3}'). Exception type: {4}. Error: {5}. This is an unexpected error. Please check the logs for more details.

data.name: UnauthorizedAccessException_SymlinkUnresolvable
data.value: Path security validation failed: Symlink detected but unable to resolve target. Symlink path: '{0}' (absolute: '{1}'). Base path: '{2}' (absolute: '{3}'). Unable to determine the symlink target, which is required for security validation. Symlinks pointing to unresolvable targets are not allowed for security reasons.

data.name: UnauthorizedAccessException_SymlinkAttackDetected
data.value: Path security validation failed: Symlink attack detected. Symlink path: '{0}' (absolute: '{1}'). Symlink target: '{2}' (absolute: '{3}'). Base directory: '{4}' (absolute: '{5}'). The symlink target is outside the allowed base directory. This is a security violation and the operation has been blocked. Please ensure all symlinks point to files within the base directory.

data.name: UnauthorizedAccessException_SymlinkValidationUnexpectedError
data.value: Path security validation failed: Unexpected error occurred during symlink validation. Symlink path: '{0}' (absolute: '{1}'). Base path: '{2}' (absolute: '{3}'). Exception type: {4}. Error: {5}. Unable to verify symlink target is safe. This is an unexpected error. Please check the logs for more details.

Exceeded by: {5} validators. This may indicate a DoS attack attempt. Please reduce the number of validators or contact your administrator to adjust the security limits.

data.name: ConfigValidator_ValidatorTypeRequired
data.value: Configuration validation failed: Required property 'validator' is missing or empty at JSON path '{0}.validator'. Rule ID: '{1}'. Validator at index {2} must have a non-empty 'validator' property specifying the validator type.

data.name: ConfigValidator_UnsupportedValidatorType
data.value: Configuration validation failed: Unsupported validator type at JSON path '{0}.validator'. Rule ID: '{1}'. Found validator type: '{2}'. Supported validator types: {3}. Please use one of the supported validator types.

data.name: ConfigValidator_ValidatorMessageRequired
data.value: Configuration validation failed: Required property 'message' is missing or empty at JSON path '{0}.message'{1}. Rule ID: '{2}'. Validator at index {3} must have a non-empty 'message' property containing the error message to display when validation fails.

data.name: ConfigValidator_ValidatorValueRequired
data.value: Configuration validation failed: Required property 'value' is missing or null at JSON path '{0}.value'. Rule ID: '{1}'. Validator type: '{2}'. The '{3}' validator requires a 'value' property to specify the expected value for comparison. Please add a 'value' property to this validator.

data.name: ConfigValidator_RuleEnvironmentNotFound
data.value: Configuration validation failed: Rule references non-existent environment ID at JSON path '$.rules[{0}].environments[{1}]'. Rule ID: '{2}'. Referenced environment ID: '{3}'. Available environment IDs: {4}. Please ensure the environment ID exists in the 'environments' array or remove it from the rule's 'environments' list.

data.name: ConfigValidator_PathContainsNullByte
data.value: Path contains null byte (\0), which is not allowed. Path value: '{0}'. Null bytes are not valid in file paths and may indicate a security issue. Please remove any null bytes from the path.

data.name: ConfigValidator_PathContainsControlChars
data.value: Path contains control characters, which are not allowed. Path value: '{0}'. Control characters found: {1}. Control characters (except tab, newline, carriage return) are not valid in file paths. Please remove any control characters from the path.

data.name: ConfigValidator_PathContainsInvalidChars
data.value: Path contains invalid characters for the current platform. Path value: '{0}'. Invalid characters found: {1}. These characters are not allowed in file paths on this operating system. Please remove or replace these characters.

data.name: ConfigValidator_PathTooManyParentRefs
data.value: Path contains too many parent directory references (..). Path value: '{0}'. Found {1} consecutive parent directory references. Maximum allowed: 2 levels. This may indicate a path traversal attempt. Please use absolute paths or paths relative to the configuration file with no more than 2 parent directory references.

data.name: ConfigValidator_PathConsecutiveSeparators
data.value: Path contains consecutive path separators, which may indicate path manipulation: '{0}'

data.name: ConfigValidator_PathTooLong
data.value: Path is too long ({0} characters). Maximum allowed: {1} characters: '{2}'

data.name: ConfigValidator_PathAbsoluteWithParentRefs
data.value: Absolute path contains parent directory references (..), which may indicate path manipulation: '{0}'
